problem.markdown:
1. The standard voltage ratings of an electromagnetic relay are-
( ) 110 V, 63.5 V(L-N) ( ) 220 V, 110 V ( ) 230 V, 154 V (x) 400 V, 231 V
2. The main function of relay is-
( ) Fault isolation (x) Fault detection ( ) Fault protection ( ) All of the above
3. The relay operating coil is energized by-
( ) Steam engine ( ) Power transformer (x) Instrument transformer ( ) None of the above
4. Which one is correct-
(x) 1 VA relay is more senstive than 5 VA relay ( ) 1 VA relay is Less senstive than 5 VA relay ( ) 1 VA relay is equally senstive than 5 VA relay ( ) None of the above
5. An over current relay having a current setting of 125% is connected to CT of 400/5. The pick up value is-
(x) 6.25 A ( ) 10 A ( ) 12.5 A ( ) 15 A
6. The pick up value of relay is 7.5 A and fault current in relay coil is 30 A. Its plug setting multiplier is-
( ) 2 A (x) 4 A ( ) 6 A ( ) 8 A
7. Induction relays are used with-
(x) AC ( ) DC ( ) Both AC and DC ( ) None of the above
8. In merz-price protection, the CT secondary of delta - star transformer is connected in-
(x) Star- delta ( ) Delta-delta ( ) Star-star ( ) Delta- star
9. The number of pilot wires required for protecting 3-phaes transmission line using transley system of protection is-
( ) 6 ( ) 4 ( ) 3 (x) 2
10. The least expensive overcurrent protection for LV system is-
( ) Isolation (x) Fuse ( ) Oil CB ( ) Air CB
problem.p: 1. The standard voltage ratings of an electromagnetic relay are-

choicegroup.choice: 1 VA relay is more senstive than 5 VA relay
1 VA relay is Less senstive than 5 VA relay
1 VA relay is equally senstive than 5 VA relay
